description:
Blueno was the bartender of a bar before he was revealed to be an assassin of http://anidb.net/ch3295 [CP9]. He`s a tall man with big lips, a black beard and black hair in which his hairstyle resemble the horn of a bull.
In the Volume 44 SBS, it was revealed that, when Blueno was younger, he loved baseball.
When invading http://anidb.net/ch3264 [Iceburg]`s mansion he was wearing the bear mask.
name: Blueno
